text:
A Bold Publishing Dream

<setup: Razumihin excitedly pitching his idea>
<speaker>: I need to borrow money from my uncle!

<speaker>: We can start a publishing business together!

<speaker>: Publishers know nothing! We can succeed!

---

<setup: Raskolnikov skeptical, Dounia listening>
<speaker>: Are you sure this will work?

<speaker>: We have the means! Why wait?

<speaker>: Itâ€™s our chance for success!

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Razumihin proposes a publishing partnership, leveraging borrowed money to capitalize on the potential profitability of the book market.
